channel.title: 2006 compiler help
channel.description:
Hey guys I got 2006 REMADE When South Park (mehh) on rune-server released it.
But i got a problem the compiler on client and source does not work NOTE: I TIRED ECLIPSE AND I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO I CHANGED THE IP INTO 127.0.0.1 AND I SAVED IT AND IT STILL DON'T WORK
What compiler does when Compiling with the Source compiler:
[CODE]This compiler should be working but i keep getting this, everytime. ive changed it in every way possible! javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
[/CODE]
Code for source compiler: [CODE] @echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause][/CODE]
What Client compiler does:
[CODE]Press any key to continue...[/CODE]
Code for Client compiler:
[CODE]@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
PLEASE HELP ME I NEED YOUR HELP!

item.title: 2006 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

For the source compiler instead of javac.exe" have you just tried it as java.exe". Make sure your environmental variables are set too.

javac.exe is the java compiler executable dude. If you use java.exe you’re just running java. It’ll throw an error saying it doesn’t understand the arguments in the .bat code.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

For the source compiler instead of javac.exe" have you just tried it as java.exe". Make sure your environmental variables are set too.

item.title: 2006 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @ranqedrs ranqedrs
item.description:
@ranqedrs wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:535965”][quote author=ranqedrs link=topic=654771.msg4385281#msg4385281 date=1385179906]
Its not working right, When i use the source compiler it gives that thing

and the client compiler works but it doesn’t save the work, but the work is saved in the .java file

I think you should look at this topic its about the same thread as here http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/help/522111-2006-compiler-help.html#post4270411
[/quote]
Got teamviewer? PM me your ID & pass and I’ll try to help.[/quote]

You can edit me on skype ashraful.hassan2 that way i’ll know when your online

EDIT: I GOT THE CLIENT COMPILER WORKING BUT THE SOURCE COMPILER IS NOT WORKING

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Are you sure that the client compiler is working fine? because the code for it matches the error you’re having. The server compiler would be showing a slightly different error…

Read full topic

item.title: 2006 compiler help
item.dc:creator: @ranqedrs ranqedrs
item.description:
@ranqedrs wrote:

Hey guys I got 2006 REMADE
When South Park (mehh) on rune-server released it.

But i got a problem the compiler on client and source does not work
NOTE: I TIRED ECLIPSE AND I DON’T KNOW WHAT TO DO I CHANGED THE IP INTO 127.0.0.1 AND I SAVED IT AND IT STILL DON’T WORK

What compiler does when Compiling with the Source compiler:

[CODE]This compiler should be working but i keep getting this, everytime. ive changed it in every way possible!
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

[/CODE]

Code for source compiler:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause]

What Client compiler does:

Press any key to continue...

Code for Client compiler:

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

PLEASE HELP ME I NEED YOUR HELP!

Read full topic
